title: i read the PBE patch notes on kench
body:
so they are taking his passive away now? the fact he scales off of hp is probably the only thing that allows him to beat juggernauts or at least stay on par with them. i mean {{champion:58}} gets a shield breaker for free yet also remove kench passive completely im guessing someone on the riot team lost to kench pretty badly. i bet that person who made it was a {{champion:58}}  main 

2ndly dang yuumi got nerfed again.

replies.body: Um... yeah, he _shouldn't be beating the most powerful 1v1 class_. He is a support. He does not belong at top lane just because his stats are completely overblown.

under whose words? because currently riot doesnt like him as support due to those unjust nerfs on his supporty style of play he functions now as a juggernaut/fighter. if they dont want that from him its like they dont know what his reason to exist is. perhaps they should delete champs they really have no clue how to balance them and refund those skins full price instead of nerfing them to oblivion. (to any champ with balance issues)

tahm doesnt just beat juggernauts. he beats everyone.

he has an average lane kill rate of 60% on most top laners. think about what that means, when people tend to play passive against him because they have no choice.

the champion is fucking aids and deserves to be olafed until they know what to do with him.

I've literally owned every single tahm kench I've played in top lane. Literally all you have to do is play like a bitch until level 7 and then stomp his face in. It's like facing teemo except easier because he's a tank that isn't ranged and can't poke through minions and doesn't have actual damage late game. Same concept, play like a bitch and you out scale no matter what champion you picked.
